ResearchProjectDef.label: basic auto-injectors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop basic automatic injection technology for emergency medical treatment. Unlocks morphine and detox auto-injectors.\n\nThese devices allow for rapid, self-administered drug delivery in critical situations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced auto-injectors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced auto-injector technology for more complex medical compounds. Unlocks epinephrine and coagulant auto-injectors.\n\nThese sophisticated devices can deliver precise doses of life-saving medications in emergency situations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military stimulants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop military-grade combat stimulant auto-injectors. These powerful drugs dramatically enhance combat performance but carry significant risks.\n\nUnlocks combat stimulant auto-injectors.
